text: Newman Catholic School is a mixed Roman Catholic secondary school and sixth form. It is located in Carlisle in the English county of Cumbria. It is a Voluntary aided school administered by Cumbria County Council and the Roman Catholic Diocese of Lancaster. The school is named after Cardinal John Henry Newman. Newman Catholic School offers GCSEs and BTECs as programmes of study for pupils, while students in the sixth form have the option to study from a range of A-levels and further BTECs. ==References== ==External links== *Newman Catholic School official website Category:Secondary schools in Cumbria Category:Catholic secondary schools in the Diocese of Lancaster Category:Voluntary aided schools in England
title: Newman Catholic School
